dcterms:description: AWS Deep Racer is a cloud-based 3D racing simulator that emulates a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car, primarily used for training reinforcement learning agents.
dcterms:title: AWS Deep Racer

dcterms:creator: Luigi Cardamone
Daniele Loiacono
Pier Luca Lanzi
Alessandro Pietro Bardelli
dcterms:description: TORCS is a portable, multi-platform car racing simulation environment that can be used as a racing game or a platform for AI research.
dcterms:title: TORCS

dcterms:creator: James Herman
Jonathan Francis
Siddha Ganju
Bingqing Chen
Anirudh Koul
Abhinav Gupta
Alexey Skabelkin
Ivan Zhukov
Max Kumskoy
Eric Nyberg
dcterms:description: Learn-to-Race is a multimodal control environment for autonomous racing that provides customizable sensory inputs and high-fidelity vehicle dynamics.
dcterms:title: Learn-to-Race

dcterms:creator: Changmao Li
dcterms:description: CarRacing-v0 is a racing environment available in OpenAI Gym, featuring a top-down view of the track and continuous action space for steering, acceleration, and braking.
dcterms:title: CarRacing-v0

dcterms:creator: Marco Del Brutto
dcterms:description: MicroRacer is a didactic environment for deep reinforcement learning, designed to allow users to experiment with various methods and hyperparameters in a car racing context.
dcterms:title: MicroRacer
